text: Ibarahima ara'o balalena [1], ‘tomara to allah‌ra paribarte murtiguloke upasyarupe grahana karecha, duniyara jibane tomadera parasparika bandhutbera khatire [2]. Pare kiyamatera dina tomara eke an'yake asbikara karabe ebam paraspara parasparake la‘nata debe. Ara tomadera abasa habe jahannama ebam tomadera kono sahayyakari thakabe na [3].’
